item.title: Introduction to Hardware Peripherals
item.description: Lately I have been doing programming for embedded systems such as the esp32 and esp8266, and additionally I did a course on embedded systems for my masters degree. This introduced me to the wonderful word of programming close to the hardware level, and inspired me to write this post about hardware peripherals. What are Hardware Peripherals? Hardware Peripherals are specialized pieces of silicon that are built into a processor. They are used to perform a diverse set of task.
